DataElement.preferredName: Tissue Donor Whole Blood Transfusion Prior 48 Hour Eligibility Determination Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The verification of whether the tissue donor received a whole blood transfusion within the 48 hours prior to procedure start time that meets the eligibility requirements.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Tissue Donor Whole Blood Transfusion Prior 48 Hour Eligibility Determination
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Someone who gives blood or tissue or an organ to be used in another person._The intravenous administration of whole blood (blood that contains plasma and red blood cells) into an individual._Earlier in time or order._A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.::48_A unit measure of time equal to 3,600 seconds or 60 minutes. It is approximately 1/24 of a median day._Criteria to determine eligibility of patients for medical care programs and services.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Someone who gives blood or tissue or an organ to be used in another person.

Concepts.definition: Someone who gives blood or tissue or an organ to be used in another person.

Property.preferredName: Whole Blood Transfusion Prior Integer::48 Hour Eligibility Determination
Property.preferredDefinition: The intravenous administration of whole blood (blood that contains plasma and red blood cells) into an individual.:Earlier in time or order.:A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.::48:A unit measure of time equal to 3,600 seconds or 60 minutes. It is approximately 1/24 of a median day.:Criteria to determine eligibility of patients for medical care programs and services.

Concepts.definition: The intravenous administration of whole blood (blood that contains plasma and red blood cells) into an individual.
A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.
A unit measure of time equal to 3,600 seconds or 60 minutes. It is approximately 1/24 of a median day.
The act of determining if a subject is suitable for enrollment in a study according specific protocol criteria and procedures.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no/unknown.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not known, not observed, not recorded, or refused.

Concepts.definition: Not known, observed, recorded; or reported as unknown by the data contributor.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no/unknown.

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of yes, no, or unknown.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.2.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Retired DBW 4-27-2016 per Tina Taylor approved by Dianne Reeves

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 3/12/17 jk added Standard reg status; ownership transfered from CTEP to NCI Standards with concurrence of CTEP/Brian Campbell. 3/35/2016 jk removed "indeterminate" value that was added in error. 7/7/2021wz: added ALT VM name for HOPE-CARE project.
